Title: silverlight PDF Printer
Description:
silverlight PDF Printer is a Silverlight library that makes it easier for developers to create PDF files on the client side.

silverlight PDF Printer is based on silverPDF
(http://silverpdf.codeplex.com/)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
silverlight PDF Printer is a Silverlight library that makes it easier for developers to create PDF files on the client side.

silverlight PDF Printer is based on silverPDF
(http://silverpdf.codeplex.com/)

This Project sponsored by The Structural Engine
http://structuralengine.cloudapp.net/wordpress/?p=171

Sample Cord
"PrintPreview" is this project's class

   private void button1_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
   { 
            PrintPreview pdfPrt = new PrintPreview();
            pdfPrt.NewPage();
            pdfPrt.PrtTxt(1, this.text1.Text);

            ChildWindow PrintPreview = new ChildWindow();
            PrintPreview.Content = pdfPrt;
            PrintPreview.Width = pdfPrt.Width;
            PrintPreview.Height = pdfPrt.Height;
            PrintPreview.Title = "Print Preview";
            PrintPreview.Show();
   }
